(nDCacheWays, power_pad).explanation: Increasing the number of data cache ways requires additional hardware structures and interconnects, which directly increases the number of I/O pads and their associated power consumption;

(nDCacheWays, power_switching).explanation: Higher cache associativity requires more complex multiplexing and selection logic that switches more frequently during cache operations, directly increasing dynamic switching power consumption;

(nDCacheWays, time).explanation: Increasing cache associativity adds complexity to the cache lookup and selection logic, which can increase the critical path delay and overall execution time;
